id.description: The identification of the EVPL instance.

mode.description: The mode of the EVPL instance, that not support modification.

interfaces.description: List of service interfaces that a EVPL instance corresponds.

interface.description: Configure the service interface that a EVPL instance corresponds.

ignore-ac-state.description: Enable/disable ignore the attachment circuit status on an interface.

peers.description: List of provider edge nodes that a EVPL instance corresponds with VXLAN encapsulation.

peer.description: Configure provider edge node that a EVPL instance corresponds with VXLAN encapsulation.

peer-ip.description: The address of provider edge node.
